THKMC is looking for a rollator commode for Mdm L due to some challenges faced during showering. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Siti Asmah at 97708144. The recipient is located at Ang Mo Kio Street 61. Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

description: This is a single parent family with a child with disability. Child has been taking drum lessons outside for a while and has expressed interest to have a drum set at home so that she can practise at home. This would help the child be meaningfully engaged at home while pursuing her interest. A drum set can be a hefty expense for the single mother to bear, additional to regular household expenses.

name: Electric Bicycle
description: Client is a young adult and sole bread winner. Father passed away and elderly mother having health issues and unable to work. Client having difficulty to find full time job due to low education. While trying to find a full-time job, he hopes to work grab delivery to earn some income to support family financial but unable to afford electric bicycle. Having a electric bicycle will help him to fulfil more job orders and earn higher income. Client don't mind second hand electric bicycle as long as it is working well.

name: Bicycle
description: Ct is a widow and a mother to 4 school-going children. Despite her full-time employment, the family still faces financial strains, Her oldest son had just successfully enrolled into a Higher NITEC course at ITE College East, and requires a laptop for school purposes; his previous laptop, which was also received via a donation, is no longer working. The school does not currently have any schemes or programmes for learning devices. Additionally, the Client's son is also keen on having a bicycle for leisure purposes and exercise.
